script.title: op-tunepfxlimits.slax
script.author: ras
script.synopsis: Automatically tune EBGP prefix-limits based on the number of prefixes currently being received over the active session.
script.description: This script uses a weighted average of the current value and the new value to slowly adjust the configured prefix-limit as a peer announces more or fewer prefixes
